root: ^“I hope you enjoyed playing this game! I want you to realize that although this game and story is fiction, these things happen in your world too.

c-0: ^Authorities could use propaganda to enforce a world view and opinion on its people. Authorities could make use of fake news to hide certain events and certain information from its people. Authorities could lie to you to keep you from knowing.
^Make sure to always think critically about the information you’re getting from different media and authorities”
